publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1683 Stuart McMillan: AMA’s Long Walk to the Beechgrove Garden for CHAS—That the Parliament congratulates AMA Garden Maintenance & Landscaping, Kilmacolm, for taking up the challenge of walking from their base to the Beechgrove Garden in Aberdeen; commends the efforts of those participating, Sandy and Alan Smith, Sean Adams and Alan McKinley, in raising money for Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (CHAS); acknowledges the time and effort of AMA who are pushing a barrow load of horse manure for use in the Beechgrove Garden, which will see them walk a near 200-mile trip; notes that the men will be collecting money and selling CHAS badges, and hopes that people seeing them on their way will offer them support in their efforts in raising money for a good cause. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Christina McKelvie*, Rob Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1683 AMA’s Long Walk to the Beechgrove Garden for CHAS (lodged on 8 April 2008) Willie Coffey*
S3M-1683 AMA’s Long Walk to the Beechgrove Garden for CHAS (lodged on 8 April 2008) Aileen Campbell*, Jack McConnell*
